mapper.select:
/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectMtngFrom */
SELECT em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1014',em.mtng_type_cd,#{lang}) as mtng_type_nm , em.dept_cd , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm3,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.excn_cycl , em.due_dtm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.reg_id , em.reg_dt , em.session_no , em.session_ord FROM kgst.ebs_mtng em left outer join kgst.com_dept cd on (em.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd) WHERE em.MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngAttendant */ select ema.atdt_user_id as member_id , atdt_user_nm as member_nm , atdt_dept_nm as dept_nm , atdt_dept_nm as poly_nm , vum.dept_cd , vum.poly_cd , vum.poly_nm , ema.atdt_div_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1017',ema.atdt_div_cd,#{lang}) as atdt_div_nm , ema.mtng_id , vum.cmit_cd from kgst.ebs_mtng_attendant ema left outer join kgst.view_user_member vum on (ema.atdt_user_id = vum.user_id ) where ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId}::BIGINT order by poly_cd

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngAgenda */ select emt.mtng_id , emt.mtng_type_cd , emt.dept_cd , ema.bill_id , ema.rslt_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1008',ema.rslt_cd,#{lang}) as rslt_nm , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg ,em.bill_name_ru ,em.bill_name_kg ,#{lang}) as bill_name , em.bill_no , em.ppsr_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.user_nm_kg ,vum.user_nm_ru ,vum.user_nm_kg ,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm , em.ppsl_dt , ebi.current_step_id , ebs.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1010', ebs.stat_cd, #{lang}) as stat_nm from ebs_mtng emt join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (emt.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) join ebs_master em on (ema.bill_id = em.bill_id) join kgst.view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) join ebs_bp_instance ebi on (em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id) join ebs_bp_step ebs on (ebi.current_step_id = ebs.step_id) where emt.mtng_id = #{mtngId} order by em.bill_no

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListDept */ select dept_cd --부서코드 , dept_nm1 --부서명(키르키즈어) , dept_nm2 --부서명(러시아어) , dept_nm3 --부서명(한국어) , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then dept_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then dept_nm2 ELSE dept_nm3 END AS deptNm , shrt_nm1 --부서 약칭(키르키즈어) , shrt_nm2 --부서 약칭(러시아어) , shrt_nm3 --부서 약칭(한국어) , ord --순서 , upr_dept_cd --상위부서코드 , use_yn --사용여부 , reg_dt --등록일자 , reg_id --등록자 , mod_id --수정자 , mod_dt --수정일자 from com_dept where 1=1 order by ord

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngFile */ SELECT SEQ , MTNG_ID , ORG_FILE_ID , ORG_FILE_NM , PDF_FILE_ID , PDF_FILE_NM , FILE_KIND_CD , FILE_SIZE , DELETE_YN FROM EBS_MTNG_FILE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngByBillId */ select ema.bill_id , em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , em.dept_cd , em.excn_cycl , em.due_dtm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , em.reg_id , em.reg_dt from ebs_mtng_agenda ema inner join ebs_mtng em on ema.mtng_id = em.mtng_id where ema.bill_id = #{billId} order by em.open_dtm

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListAgenda */ select ema.mtng_id , ema.bill_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg,em.bill_name_ru,em.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.user_nm_kg,vum.user_nm_ru,vum.user_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.bill_no , mt.open_dtm from ebs_mtng mt join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (mt.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) join ebs_master em on (em.bill_id = ema.bill_id) join kgst.view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) where 1=1 and mt.mtng_id = #{mtngId}
